items.sentence: Didn\'t you know I was hoping Tom would win?
Tom couldn\'t have done what you say he did.
Do you care what kind of music we listen to?
Tom seems a lot happier since you showed up.
Tom seems to be a bit more shaken than Mary.
Tom seems to be in a really good mood today.
Tom seems to be running away from something.
Tom seems to be thoroughly enjoying himself.
Tom seems to really enjoy talking with Mary.
Tom put on his pajamas and climbed into bed.
Tom rubbed his hands in front of the heater.
Does it matter to you if I\'m a little late?
What kind of music will you guys be playing?
What language do you two use to communicate?
Tom and Mary had a huge argument last night.
If Tom comes, won\'t you please let me know?
If it snows tomorrow, I\'ll build a snowman.
I saw Tom\'s car parked in Mary\'s driveway.
I was impressed by the way Tom spoke French.
I wish I had gone to the theater last night.
I don\'t speak French as fluently as you do.
I don\'t think Tom has any ulterior motives.
My father often goes to America on business.
No one but you could have done it this well.
Tom and Mary plan to have a party next week.
Tom and Mary played together almost all day.
You\'ve been waiting for this, haven\'t you?
You\'ve known Tom a long time, haven\'t you?
I thought Tom and Mary were going to Boston.
I thought Tom had already done his homework.
I thought Tom would watch the ships leaving.
Tom is three inches taller than his wife is.
Tom is unlikely to be busy this time of day.
I was the one who taught Tom how to do that.
I was thirsty and wanted something to drink.
I\'ll never forget the first time I saw you.
I\'ve been looking forward to this all week.
No matter what you do, Tom will never agree.
No one has the right to tell you what to do.
No one has the right to treat you like this.
How\'s your Christmas shopping coming along?
Tom has been accused of being a jewel thief.
Tom has been arrested three times this year.
Tom has been charged with all three murders.
It was a shock to hear about Tom\'s divorce.
Tom usually only eats oatmeal for breakfast.
Tom walked up to the door and rang the bell.
Tom wanted to know when Mary would get home.
I never heard any details about Tom\'s trip.
Tom will get a chance to do that, I\'m sure.
